thread.title: North Korea's international airport terminal opens in Pyongyang, in pictures
thread.title_full: North Korea's international airport terminal opens in Pyongyang, in pictures

author: Telegraph Staff
title: North Korea's international airport terminal opens in Pyongyang, in pictures
text:
MORE... 
North Korea opened a new terminal building at Pyongyang's international airport, underscoring an effort to attract more tourists and to spruce up the country ahead of a celebration of a major anniversary of the founding of its ruling party in October Picture: AFP
